title: "Aster Accuracy Metrics"
---

# Accuracy

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
library(yardstick)
library(gt)
acc_df <- vroom::vroom(here::here("data/accuracy.csv"))

multi_metric <- yardstick::metric_set(rsq, ccc, mae, rmse)
mm_df <- multi_metric(acc_df, truth = truth, estimate = predicted)
tibble::tibble(
    Metric = c("R squared", "Concordance correlation coefficient","Mean absolute error","Root mean squared error"),
    Estimate = mm_df$.estimate |> round(digits = 2)
) |> 
    gt::gt() |> 
    tab_header(
    title = md("**Accuracy metrics**"),
    subtitle = md("Aster bee detection")
  ) |> 
    tab_options(
        table_body.border.top.style = "none",
        row.striping.background_color = "white"
    )

```
